member.name: T:LIMS.Debugging.Logger
member.summary: Static class used for thread-safe logging. Writes timestamped log entries into per-day log files under the application Log directory.

member.summary: Gets the todays log file path.

member.name: M:LIMS.Debugging.Logger.Write(LIMS.Debugging.LogType,System.String)
member.summary: Writes the a passed message (with a specific type) into todays log file.
member.param: The type of the message (LogType enum).
The specific message to be written into the log file (string).

member.name: T:LIMS.Logic.Core.DataStorage
member.summary: Class responsible for storing and managing loaded image data in a thread-safe manner. It maintains an internal dictionary of ImageDataContainer objects, indexed by file path, and provides controlled access for adding, retrieving, clearing, and listing stored images.

member.name: M:LIMS.Logic.Core.DataStorage.AddImage(LIMS.Logic.ImageLoading.ImageDataContainer)
member.summary: Adds an image to the storage (images dictionary) if it has not been added before.
member.param: The instance to store.
member.remarks: If an image with the same file path already exists, the method does nothing. Thread-safe.

member.name: M:LIMS.Logic.Core.DataStorage.TryGetImage(System.String,LIMS.Logic.ImageLoading.ImageDataContainer@)
member.summary: Attempts to retrieve an image from storage using its file path.
member.param: The key used to find the stored image.
The retrieved instance, or null if not found.

member.name: M:LIMS.Logic.Core.DataStorage.Clear
member.summary: Removes all stored images from memory.

member.name: M:LIMS.Logic.Core.DataStorage.TryRemoveImage(System.String,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Tries to remove an image from the storage. Returns a boolean providing information about the success of the operation.
member.param: The file path to the image to be deleted
if set to true the image was successfully removed; otherwise false.

member.name: M:LIMS.Logic.Core.DataStorage.GetAllImages
member.summary: Retrieves a list of all stored images.
member.returns: A list containing all objects currently stored.

member.name: T:LIMS.Logic.Core.ProcessingEngine
member.summary: Class responsible for running enabled image-processing tools on all stored images. It retrieves images from the DataStorage and applies each active ToolBase instance from the ToolsManager in a parallelized manner to improve performance.

member.name: M:LIMS.Logic.Core.ProcessingEngine.Run
member.summary: Executes all enabled tools on every image currently stored in .
member.remarks: The processing is performed in parallel for improved efficiency. Each enabled tool in is applied to each image.

member.name: T:LIMS.Logic.Events.BusyStateChangedEvent
member.summary: Static class representing a global event for indicating changes in the application's busy state. It exposes an event that clients can subscribe to, which is raised whenever the application enters or exits a busy state.

member.name: T:LIMS.Logic.ImageLoading.ImageDataContainer
member.summary: Class representing image data loaded from the file system. It stores the source file path and optionally the raw byte content of the image. Used as the primary data container for image processing operations.

member.name: T:LIMS.Logic.ImageLoading.ImageLoader
member.summary: Static class responsible for asynchronously loading image files from disk and storing them into a instance. It reads raw image bytes and wraps them into objects, making them available for later processing.

member.name: M:LIMS.Logic.ImageLoading.ImageLoader.LoadImagesAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},LIMS.Logic.Core.DataStorage)
member.summary: Asynchronously loads raw bytes from multiple image files and stores them in the provided instance.
member.param: A collection of file system paths pointing to image files.
The used to store loaded objects.
member.remarks: Each image is loaded in a separate task to improve performance.

member.name: T:LIMS.Logic.TabContext
member.summary: Represents the context of a tab in the application, managing both image storage and associated image-processing tools. Provides methods to execute tools and validate their states.

member.name: M:LIMS.Logic.TabContext.ProcessAllTools
member.summary: Executes all enabled tools on all images stored in .
member.remarks: Internally creates a and runs it.

member.name: M:LIMS.Logic.TabContext.ToolsInValidStates(System.String@)
member.summary: Checks if all tools in are in valid states.
member.param: Outputs the error message of the first invalid tool encountered; otherwise null.
member.returns: true if all tools are in valid states; otherwise false.

member.name: T:LIMS.Logic.Tools.BrightnessTool
member.summary: Tool that adjusts the brightness of an image. Brightness multiplier must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 3. Inherits from .

member.name: M:LIMS.Logic.Tools.BrightnessTool.Apply(LIMS.Logic.ImageLoading.ImageDataContainer)
member.summary: Applies brightness adjustment to the provided image if the tool is enabled.
member.param: The target to modify.

member.name: M:LIMS.Logic.Tools.BrightnessTool.IsInValidState(System.String@)
member.summary: Checks if the tool is in a valid state. Since the input value is always checked it is not possible to force an error.
member.param: Outputs an error message if invalid; always null in this tool.

member.name: T:LIMS.Logic.Tools.FlipTool
member.summary: Tool that flips an image horizontally, vertically, or both. Inherits from .

member.name: M:LIMS.Logic.Tools.FlipTool.Apply(LIMS.Logic.ImageLoading.ImageDataContainer)
member.summary: Applies flipping to the provided image if the tool is enabled.
member.param: The target to modify.

member.name: M:LIMS.Logic.Tools.FlipTool.IsInValidState(System.String@)
member.summary: Checks if at least one flip direction is enabled when the tool is active.
member.param: Outputs an error message if no direction is selected.

member.name: T:LIMS.Logic.Tools.ResizeTool
member.summary: Tool that resizes an image to specific width and height values. Width and height must be greater than zero and within reasonable bounds. Inherits from .

member.name: M:LIMS.Logic.Tools.ResizeTool.Apply(LIMS.Logic.ImageLoading.ImageDataContainer)
member.summary: Applies resizing to the provided image if tool is enabled and width/height are valid.
member.param: The target to modify.

member.name: M:LIMS.Logic.Tools.ResizeTool.IsInValidState(System.String@)
member.summary: Checks whether the tool is in a valid state for execution.
member.param: Outputs an error message if width or height is invalid.
member.returns: true if width and height are valid or tool is disabled; otherwise false.

member.name: M:LIMS.Logic.Tools.ResizeTool.InValidRange(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if the value (for the width/height) is in the valid range (between 1 and 10000).
member.param: The value.
member.returns: true if in valid range; otherwise false.

member.name: T:LIMS.Logic.Tools.ScaleTool
member.summary: Tool that proportionally scales an image based on a scale factor. The scale factor can range from 0 to 2. Inherits from .

member.name: M:LIMS.Logic.Tools.ScaleTool.Apply(LIMS.Logic.ImageLoading.ImageDataContainer)
member.summary: Applies scaling to the provided image if the tool is enabled.
member.param: The target to modify.

member.name: M:LIMS.Logic.Tools.ScaleTool.IsInValidState(System.String@)
member.summary: Determines whether the tool is in a valid state.
member.param: Outputs an error message if the tool is invalid.
member.returns: Always true because any valid scale is acceptable.

member.name: T:LIMS.Logic.Tools.ToolBase
member.summary: Abstract base class for all image-processing tools.

member.name: T:LIMS.Logic.Tools.ToolsManager
member.summary: Class responsible for managing all image-processing tools in the system. Provides functionality to register new tools and access the collection of registered tools.

member.summary: Registers a new tool to the manager if it is not already registered.
member.typeparam: The type of the tool, derived from .
member.param: The tool instance to register.
member.returns: The registered tool if it was successfully added; otherwise null

member.name: T:LIMS.Logic.Tools.WatermarkTool
member.summary: Class responsible for managing all image-processing tools in the system. Provides functionality to register new tools and access the collection of registered tools.

member.name: M:LIMS.Logic.Tools.WatermarkTool.Apply(LIMS.Logic.ImageLoading.ImageDataContainer)
member.summary: Applies the watermark to the provided .
member.param: The target image on which the watermark should be applied.
member.remarks: The watermark is resized proportionally to fit within a quarter of the target image.

member.name: M:LIMS.Logic.Tools.WatermarkTool.calculateWatermarkXPosition(SixLabors.ImageSharp.Image{SixLabors.ImageSharp.PixelFormats.Rgba32},SixLabors.ImageSharp.Image{SixLabors.ImageSharp.PixelFormats.Rgba32})
member.summary: Calculates the X coordinate for the watermark based on .
member.param: The base image.
The watermark image.
member.returns: The X coordinate where the watermark should be placed.

member.name: M:LIMS.Logic.Tools.WatermarkTool.calculateWatermarkYPosition(SixLabors.ImageSharp.Image{SixLabors.ImageSharp.PixelFormats.Rgba32},SixLabors.ImageSharp.Image{SixLabors.ImageSharp.PixelFormats.Rgba32})
member.summary: Calculates the Y coordinate for the watermark based on .
member.param: The base image.
The watermark image.
member.returns: The Y coordinate where the watermark should be placed.

member.name: M:LIMS.Logic.Tools.WatermarkTool.IsInValidState(System.String@)
member.summary: Checks whether the tool is in a valid state for execution.
member.param: Outputs an error message if the tool is not ready; otherwise null.
member.returns: true if the tool is enabled and a watermark path has been set; otherwise false.

member.name: T:LIMS.Safety.SafeExecutor
member.summary: Static utility class responsible for safely executing synchronous and asynchronous actions with standardized error handling.

member.name: M:LIMS.Safety.SafeExecutor.Execute(System.Action,System.String,System.Action)
member.summary: Safely executes the specified action.
member.param: The action to be executed (in the try block).
The error message to be displayed if the action fails.
The action to be executed in the end (in the finally block).

member.name: M:LIMS.Safety.SafeExecutor.ExecuteAsync(System.Func{System.Threading.Tasks.Task},System.String,System.Func{System.Threading.Tasks.Task})
member.summary: Safely executes an asynchronous action.
member.param: The action to be executed (in the try block).
The error message to be displayed if the action fails.
The action to be executed in the end (in the finally block).

member.name: M:LIMS.Safety.SafeExecutor.HandleError(System.Exception,System.String)
member.summary: Shows the error to the user and logs it.
member.param: The exception to be logged.
The error message to be displayed (and logged).

member.name: M:LIMS.UI.Panels.PreviewPanel.UpdatePreviewAsync
member.summary: Asynchronously updates the preview image. Cancels any previous ongoing updates to ensure UI responsiveness.
member.remarks: In this method it was avoided (on purpose) to pass the token to Task.Run. Doing this might trigger the . This exception has to be ignored, but the SafeExecutor would catch it as an error - this is unwanted behaviour. To prevent this, the cancelation token is checked manually instead.

member.summary: InitializeComponent
